data.title: Eyemart Express
data.meta_description: Get the help you need. Learn about our community health initiatives, cleaning and adjusting glasses, eye and body health, and our available online options....
data.text:
We want to thank you for your overwhelming support over the last few months. Your feedback has reinforced the important role that our stores play in helping you and your local communities see clearly, even during the most challenging times.

With enhanced safety measures in place, we will continue to make your shopping experience as comfortable as possible.

EyemartExpress.com/COVID

" "

Clean Your Glasses

From lens cleaner to mild soap and warm water, cleaning your glasses properly goes a long way in keeping them in tip top shape!

Let’s Clean

" "

Adjust Your Glasses

Adjusting your glasses on your own can seem scary, but it isn’t! All you need is warm water and a little patience, and your glasses will be sitting pretty again in no time!

Let’s Adjust

" "

Purchase Online

Our online store allows our returning customers to get glasses delivered straight to your door! We’ll serve you frames based on past purchases and your Rx!

Let’s Shop Online

" "

Stay Connected

It’s really easy to keep track of what we’re up to, follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter at Eyemart Express for updates!

Let's Connect

" "

Eye Health

Keeping your eyes healthy is super important. Our friends over at Think About Your Eyes post tons of helpful information to help protect your eyes every day.

Let’s Learn

" "

Stay Healthy

This isn’t eye related, but we love you and want you to take care of yourself. Take walks when you can, get good sleep, and stay positive!

Let’s Get Healthy
